course_complete_desc: You have successfully completed the course:
tour_step1_desc: Find the perfect course for you using our powerful search engine.
tour_step2_desc: Your AI tutor is available 24/7 to answer all your questions.
tour_step3_desc: After each completed course, find your certificates here and share them.
welcome_desc: Ready to start your journey? Let us give you a quick tour.
stats_description: Overview of the platform's key performance indicators.
reasonTopic: Topic not relevant to the platform
rejectionTemplateQuality: Hello, thank you for your application. Unfortunately, the quality of the presentation video does not meet our current standards. We encourage you to improve your equipment and apply again.
rejectionTemplateTopic: Hello, thank you for your interest. After review, the course topic you propose does not align with our current priorities. We wish you the best of luck.
rejectionTemplateIncomplete: Hello, your application is incomplete. Please ensure all links (YouTube, Facebook, presentation video) are valid and all information is filled out before resubmitting.
rejectionTemplateGeneric: Hello, thank you for your application. Unfortunately, we cannot proceed with your request at this time.
acceptanceTemplate: Congratulations! Your application has been accepted. You now have full access to the course creation tools. Welcome to the FormaAfrique team!
applicationApprovedMessage: The instructor has been notified and now has access to the tools.
applicationRejectedMessage: The user's role has been reverted to 'student'.
aiRequestProcessed: The request was processed by the AI assistant.
aiRequestError: The request to the AI assistant failed.
mktExamples: Use simple language. E.g., 'create a 25% discount for mother's day', 'write an announcement for a new finance course'.
marketingDescription: Create promo codes and announcements to engage your audience.
moderationDescription: Approve new courses submitted by instructors.
pendingCoursesDescription: These courses will not be visible to students until they are approved.
noPendingCoursesMessage: No courses are currently pending validation.
courseApprovedMessage: The course is now published and visible to all.
transactionsDescription: History of all sales made on the platform.
firestoreIndexError: Database error. An index is likely missing. Contact technical support.
transactionsSearchDescription: Search for a transaction by buyer name, email, or transaction ID.
noTransactionsYet: No transactions have been recorded yet.
payoutsManagementDescription: Manage and approve instructor payment requests.
noPayoutsForStatus: There are no payout requests with the status '{{status}}'.
payoutMarkedAs: The request has been marked as {{status}}.
supportDescription: View and respond to questions from students and instructors.
subject: Subject
manageUsersDescription: Manage accounts, roles, and statuses of all users.
allRegisteredUsers: Overview of all registered users on the platform.
name: Name
adminNotConnected: Administrator not connected or invalid token.
editRoleDescription: Changing the role will affect the user's permissions.
deleteUserConfirmationMessage: This action is irreversible. {{name}}'s account will be permanently deleted. All associated data will be lost.
settings_desc: Configure the general, commercial, and legal aspects of your platform.
commission_desc: The percentage FormaAfrique takes on each sale.
featured_course_desc: The ID of the course to display on the homepage (leave empty if none).
maintenance_desc: If enabled, only admins will be able to access the site.
allow_applications_desc: If disabled, the 'Become an Instructor' button will be hidden.
settings_saved_desc: The global site configurations have been updated.
alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted your work for this assignment.
noAssignmentsTodo: Great! You have no pending assignments.
noAssignmentsInProgress: No assignments are currently being graded.
noAssignmentsGraded: No assignments have been graded yet.
